Park Dietz, M.D., M.P.H., Ph.D.

THREAT ASSESSMENT GROUP WORKPLACE VIOLENCE PREVENTION TRAINING PACKAGES, VIDEOS, AND E-LEARNING COURSES SCRIPTED BY DR. DIETZ:
1995 Supporting a Nonviolent Workplace: A Training Program for Managers and Supervisors (with Sheryl Niebuhr, Ph.D., a facilitated training program developed for 3M Company), and later editions thereof
1999 Gatekeeper Safety: How to Deal with Unwanted Letters, Calls and Visits (training video with Ann Coppel for Safeco Corporation)
2003 Managing Troubled Employees (training video)
2003 Managing Troubling Situations (training video)
2003 Your Role in Workplace Violence Prevention (training video)
2015 Principles of Workplace Violence Prevention (training video)
2015 Investigation (training video)
2015 Assessing and Managing Workplace Threats (training video)
2015 Intimate Partner Violence and the Workplace (training video)
2015 Stalking (training video)
DOJ-OGR-00007633
